name: Food Frenzy - Shoot the stack
description:
Shoot the cannon on food stacks.
Destroy the food stacks to clear the levels and collect bonus.
Feed the fish in the sea by fire ball maximum 3D food helix stacks.
Choose from a wide range of cannons.
Fire Ball on the 3D stack in a burst to achieve combo and earn bonus points.
Unlock new fishes in the aquarium by completing levels.
Don't forget to feed the fishes regularly.

Feel Free to Rate and Review. Your suggestions and feedback will be materialized ASAP.
